title: Chuugaku nante Iranai. Futokou no Musume ga Koukou ni Kougaku suru made
original_name: 中学なんていらない。 不登校の娘が高校に合格するまで
sinopse: "During the second summer of her middle school, my daughter suddenly stopped going to middle school, because of bullying. I had to convince her school to change, and even harder, to convince her to stop being a truant…"
